Mendicant Reading club: Beautiful Visualization

I’ll be driving a book club session at mendicant university. We’ll be reading (if there is somebody interested in joining in) Beautiful Visualization. I’ve recently became interested in UX and visualization of large amounts of data is, at this moment, for me an art more than a science. I hope we are able to throw some light over this topic.

I’ll try to keep the discussion running by asking questions and organizing small debates.

This is the first time I do something like this but I hope this is a good experience for everybody.
